transArray.content: The overall environment and location are good. It's average for Huazhu. There are also some good restaurants downstairs. Contact us to put an air purifier in the room in the inner corridor, otherwise the smell of the new decoration will still be a bit loud.

We know each other as clear as water, as bright as a mirror, and our hearts are clear and reflected. I believe you must feel our sincerity and efforts. Your praise is our pride. We look forward to seeing you again.
